


<b>BOTANY (new version is "botanical")</b>

<p>CAUTION: A lot of the functions pass strings to subprocesses.</p>
</p>Various calculator tools</p>

<section>
<header>Directory Equalizer</header>
<code>
import BOTANY.FS.DIRECTORY.EQUALIZE as EQUALIZE
EQUALIZE.MULTIPLE ({
	"DIRECTORY 1": "",
	"DIRECTORY 2": "",
	
	"DIRECTORIES": [
		
	],
	
	"START": "yes"	
})
</code>
</section>
